member.name: EMREXTFLOODFILL
member.summary: The EMREXTFLOODFILL structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record.

member.name: EMREXTFLOODFILL.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMREXTFLOODFILL.ptlStart
member.summary: Coordinates, in logical units, where filling begins.

member.name: EMREXTFLOODFILL.crColor
member.summary: Color of fill. To make a COLORREF value, use the macro.

member.name: EMREXTFLOODFILL.iMode
member.summary: Type of fill operation to be performed. This member must be either the FLOODFILLBORDER or FLOODFILLSURFACE value.
